name: Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder
name_original: Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder
description:
Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder is an action game.
Dungeons & Dragons: Eye of the Beholder is available on Game Boy Advance.
It was directed by Brett W. Sperry. Paul S. Mudra and Yuzo Koshiro scored the game.
